description:
Actor Denzel Washington is one of the new stars in Ridley Scott’s Gladiator II, the long-awaited sequel to his hit film Gladiator. While fans wait for Gladiator II to hit theaters, Denzel Washington has given a surprising bit of information, revealing that a gay kiss scene was cut from the film. Washington revealed the existence [...]

The post Denzel Washington Says ‘Gladiator 2’ Gay Kiss Scene Was Cut appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Denzel Washington Says ‘Gladiator 2’ Gay Kiss Scene Was Cut

description:
The Addams Family franchise reached a new level of popularity with the hit Netflix series Wednesday. The show, which stars Jenna Ortega as the titular character, quickly blew up online and prompted all sorts of social media attention. Now, in a full-circle way given the use of her music in countless social media videos pertaining [...]

title: Lady Gaga Joins ‘Wednesday’ Season 2 Cast
